categories: Category:Hyperspace: The Official Star Wars Fan Club

nodes.text: The General Grievous Halloween audiocast was an audiocast recorded by Matthew Wood as General Grievous and released on StarWars.com for Halloween of 2005. Initially, it was available only to Hyperspace members, but beginning October 26, 2006, it was made available for download to all readers of the site. It was re-released on the site on October 31, 2014.
